short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the spanky time. Auto remove your browsing history after your spanky time is over.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the spanky time extension for Chrome. We know how important it is to rub on-off and spanky helps you do this with complete privacy. All your browsing history will be removed in one hour or when you press the stop button!
